## KmpCompiler.buildKmpFile() method

Returns a Promise to the serialized data which can then be written to a .kmp file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildKmpFile(kpsFilename: string, kmpJsonData: KmpJsonFile.KmpJsonFile): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kpsFilename | string | Filename of the kps, not read, used only for calculating relative paths |
|  kmpJsonData | KmpJsonFile.KmpJsonFile | The kmp.json Object |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;
